content:
# I have successfully crafted one stone furnace and added it to my inventory. Now I can proceed to smelt the 10 copper ore into copper plates using this furnace.

# I will place the stone furnace in a suitable location and then insert the copper ore into it for smelting.

# First, I will move to a position where I can place the furnace.
furnace_position = nearest_buildable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Finding a valid position to place the furnace.
move_to(furnace_position)  # Moving to the chosen position.
stone_furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Placing the stone furnace.
print(f"Placed stone furnace at {furnace_position}.")  # Confirming placement of the furnace.

# Now, I will insert the copper ore and some fuel (coal) into the furnace to start the smelting process.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, stone_furnace, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 coal into the furnace for fuel.
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, stone_furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting 10 copper ore into the furnace for smelting.
print(f"Furnace Inventory: {inspect_inventory(stone_furnace)}")  # Displaying the furnace's inventory.
